org.cantaloupe.audio.source

Class SourcePlayerSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.audio.source.SourcePlayerSettings

  • public class SourcePlayerSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing a player's settings for a source.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens
